title: League failing to update
body: League is failing to update not just for me however, for my companions across the U.S as well. Someone help please

replies.body: There was an issue where some players were failing to patch earlier, but everything should be fine now.  Make sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates on server issues.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
